attributes.action: Banning TV advertising and Limiiting the APR  % charged on short term loans
attributes.additional_details: In recent years there has been a spread of loan companies charging  interest rates in the region of up to 4,500%APR for short term pay day type loans.These rates and the non payment can soon run out of work teenagers, pensioners  and gullible individuals into astronomical debt .I  believe there should be a ban on TV advertising and moves to limit the maximum percentage APR on any advertised loan
